name: intro-to-redux-lecture-excersises
description: ## Assessment 1 * Create a reducer which responds to the event 'INCREMENT_COUNTER' by incremeting the `counter` property in state * Use `createStore` to create a store. * Use store.dispatch to dispatch the INCREMENT_COUNTER action * Install Redux Devtools: https://github.com/zalmoxisus/redux-devtools-extension * Open Redux Devtools and use it to visualize the change in state
